bug.author: lvybriage
bug.description: I want to copy trial's parameters rather than all trial parameters details. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/35484733/72588944-d0a86180-3934-11ea-8249-1512e920c156.png></denchmark-link>

comments.comment: In latest nni version(v1.4), we change the design. when you click the button named Copy as json, will copy it directly.
